15860.comment: Has a script that is called on button press

15885.author: tessi
15885.message: TextBubble calls its disappear() function after showBubbleTime() milliseconds now

15887.author: tessi
15887.message: TextBubble calls its disappear() function after showBubbleTime() milliseconds now

15889.author: undefined
15889.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

15916.author: tessi
15916.message: TextBubble calls its disappear() function after showBubbleTime() milliseconds now

15918.author: tessi
15918.message: TextBubble calls its disappear() function after showBubbleTime() milliseconds now

15920.author: undefined
15920.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

15939.comment: A simple box morph. A really blue one. Its amazing what you can build out of simple boxes.... Who needs stars when you got blue rectangles!
